Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Identificable
    An interface for objects that have to be identified by an id.
    Nameable
    An interface for objects that have to be identified by an id and that also have a name.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CloudInformationService
    A Cloud Information Service (CIS) is an entity that provides cloud resource registration, indexing and discovery services.
    CloudSim
    Manages Cloud Computing simulations providing all methods to start, pause and stop them.
    CloudSimShutdown
    CloudimShutdown waits for termination of all CloudSim user entities to determine the end of simulation.
    CloudSimTags
    Contains various static command tags that indicate a type of action that needs to be undertaken by CloudSim entities when they receive or send events.
    DeferredQueue
    This class implements the deferred event queue used by CloudSim.
    FutureQueue
    This class implements the future event queue used by CloudSim.
    SimEntity
    This class represents a simulation entity.
    SimEvent
    This class represents a simulation event which is passed between the entities in the simulation.
